name: BreakBeat - demonstration build
description:
I am uploading this build to show what I am working on. BreakBeat is a freeform rhythm game based on the gameplay of Breakout. I am using FMOD and Unity to create a music system that the player can interact with and jam out with the music all under the guise of a rhythm game.

  • Click or press the space bar to bounce the ball the opposite direction (if the ball is travelling up it will bounce down and vise-versa)
  • Press the pause button in the top-left corner to pause the game and to toggle an 'infinite bounce mode'
  • There are many, many bugs still so be careful!
